description: When multiple migrations are ongoing at the same time, it's not easy to track the rsync progress of each one in the logs. We probably need to add the instance UUID to the rsync debug log to differentiate which rsync process is tied to which migration.
title: Improve rsync debug log when multiple migrations are in progress

comments.content: When multiple migrations are ongoing at the same time, it's not easy to track the rsync progress of each one in the logs. We probably need to add the instance UUID to the rsync debug log to differentiate which rsync process is tied to which migration.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zenet

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/43200
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/1df56a5c4a5c3bf05603f69e8f2a2163d471bc33
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 1df56a5c4a5c3bf05603f69e8f2a2163d471bc33
Author: Zaina Afoulki <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Aug 21 17:14:23 2013 -0500

    Adds Instance UUID to rsync debug logging
    
    This commit adds the instance uuid to the rsync debug output in
    the debug logs. The issue we were seeing is that when multiple
    migrations are ongoing at the same time, it's not easy to
    track the rsync progress of each migration.
    Fixes: bug #1215629
    
    Change-Id: Iec662bdc0aed1c6f54ecaa062335dc5504ac030f
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
